verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H854><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Stand <S%H5975><s%> in the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>word,<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H8085>Hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> ye of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> that <S%H935>enter<s%> in at <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H8179>gates<s%> to <S%H7812>worship<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3190>Amend<s%> your <S%H1870>ways<s%> and your <S%H4611>doings,<s%> and I will cause you to <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place.<s%>

Trust <S%H982><s%> ye <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H413>in<s%> <S%H8267>lying<s%> <S%H1697>words,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> The <S%H1964>temple<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> The <S%H1964>temple<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> The <S%H1964>temple<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> are <S%H1992>these.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518>if<s%> ye throughly <S%H3190>amend<s%> <S%H3190><s%> <S%H853><s%> your <S%H1870>ways<s%> and your <S%H4611>doings;<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> ye throughly <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H6213><s%> <S%H4941>judgment<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> and his <S%H7453>neighbor;<s%>

If ye <S%H6231>oppress<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> the <S%H1616>stranger,<s%> the <S%H3490>fatherless,<s%> and the <S%H490>widow,<s%> and <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H5355>innocent<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> to your hurt: <S%H7451><s%>

Then will I cause you to <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place,<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> I <S%H5414>gave<s%> to your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> <S%H4480>forever<s%> <S%H5769><s%> and <S%H5704>ever.<s%> <S%H5769><s%>
Behold, <S%H2009><s%> <S%H859>ye<s%> <S%H982>trust<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> <S%H8267>lying<s%> <S%H1697>words,<s%> that <S%H1115>cannot<s%> <S%H3276>profit.<s%>

Will ye <S%H1589>steal,<s%> <S%H7523>murder,<s%> and commit <S%H5003>adultery,<s%> and <S%H7650>swear<s%> <S%H8267>falsely,<s%> and burn <S%H6999>incense<s%> unto <S%H1168>Baal,<s%> and <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> ye <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3808>not;<s%>

And <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> my <S%H8034>name,<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> We are delivered to <S%H5337>do<s%> <S%H4616><s%> <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H8441>abominations?<s%>

Is <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> my <S%H8034>name,<s%> <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H4631>den<s%> of <S%H6530>robbers<s%> in your <S%H5869>eyes?<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> <S%H1571>even<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> have <S%H7200>seen<s%> it, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

But <S%H3588><s%> <S%H1980>go<s%> ye <S%H4994>now<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> my <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was in <S%H7887>Shiloh,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> I <S%H7931>set<s%> my <S%H8034>name<s%> at the <S%H7223>first,<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H834>what<s%> I <S%H6213>did<s%> to it <S%H4480>for<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And <S%H6528>now,<s%> <S%H3282>because<s%> ye have <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H4639>works,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and I <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> you, rising up <S%H7925>early<s%> and <S%H1696>speaking,<s%> but ye <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H3808>not;<s%> and I <S%H7121>called<s%> you, but ye <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H3808>not;<s%>

Therefore will I <S%H6213>do<s%> unto this <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> my <S%H8034>name,<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> <S%H859>ye<s%> <S%H982>trust,<s%> and unto the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H5414>gave<s%> to you and to your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> I have <S%H6213>done<s%> to <S%H7887>Shiloh.<s%>

And I will <S%H7993>cast<s%> you out <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H5921><s%> my <S%H6440>sight,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> I have cast <S%H7993>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H251>brethren,<s%> <S%H853><s%> even the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim.<s%>

Therefore <S%H6419>pray<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H1157>for<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H408>neither<s%> lift <S%H5375>up<s%> <S%H7440>cry<s%> nor <S%H8605>prayer<s%> <S%H1157>for<s%> them, <S%H408>neither<s%> make <S%H6293>intercession<s%> to me: <S%H3588>for<s%> I will <S%H369>not<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> thee.

Seest <S%H7200><s%> thou <S%H369>not<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and in the <S%H2351>streets<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem?<s%>

The <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H3950>gather<s%> <S%H6086>wood,<s%> and the <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H1197>kindle<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H784>fire,<s%> and the <S%H802>women<s%> <S%H3888>knead<s%> their <S%H1217>dough,<s%> to <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H3561>cakes<s%> to the <S%H4446>queen<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and to pour <S%H5258>out<s%> drink <S%H5262>offerings<s%> unto <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> they may provoke me to <S%H3707>anger.<s%>

Do <S%H1992>they<s%> provoke me to <S%H3707>anger?<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> do they <S%H3808>not<s%> provoke themselves <S%H4616>to<s%> the <S%H1322>confusion<s%> of their own <S%H6440>faces?<s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> mine <S%H639>anger<s%> and my <S%H2534>fury<s%> shall be poured <S%H5413>out<s%> <S%H413>upon<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place,<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H120>man,<s%> and <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H929>beast,<s%> and <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H7704>field,<s%> and <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of the <S%H127>ground;<s%> and it shall <S%H1197>burn,<s%> and shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H3518>quenched.<s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> <S%H5595>Put<s%> your burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> <S%H5921>unto<s%> your <S%H2077>sacrifices,<s%> and <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H1320>flesh.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H853>unto<s%> your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> them in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I <S%H3318>brought<s%> them out of the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> <S%H1697><s%> burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> or sacrifices: <S%H2077><s%>

But <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> I them, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H8085>Obey<s%> my <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and I will <S%H1961>be<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H859>ye<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> my <S%H5971>people:<s%> and <S%H1980>walk<s%> ye in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1870>ways<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> I have <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you, <S%H4616>that<s%> it may be <S%H3190>well<s%> unto you.

But they <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> <S%H3808>not,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H5186>inclined<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H241>ear,<s%> but <S%H1980>walked<s%> in the <S%H4156>counsels<s%> and in the <S%H8307>imagination<s%> of their <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and <S%H1961>went<s%> <S%H268>backward,<s%> and <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6440>forward.<s%>

Since <S%H4480><s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> your <S%H1>fathers<s%> came <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> I have even <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H853>you<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H5650>servants<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> <S%H3117>daily<s%> rising up <S%H7925>early<s%> and <S%H7971>sending<s%> them:

Yet they <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H5186>inclined<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H241>ear,<s%> but <S%H7185>hardened<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H6203>neck:<s%> they did <S%H7489>worse<s%> than their <S%H4480>fathers.<s%> <S%H1><s%>

Therefore thou shalt <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them; but they will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8085>hearken<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> thee: thou shalt also <S%H7121>call<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them; but they will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6030>answer<s%> thee.

But thou shalt <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H2088>This<s%> is a <S%H1471>nation<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H8085>obeyeth<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> their <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H3947>receiveth<s%> <S%H4148>correction:<s%> <S%H530>truth<s%> is <S%H6>perished,<s%> and is cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from their <S%H4480>mouth.<s%> <S%H6310><s%>

Cut <S%H1494>off<s%> thine <S%H5145>hair,<s%> O Jerusalem, and cast it <S%H7993>away,<s%> and take <S%H5375>up<s%> a <S%H7015>lamentation<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> high <S%H8205>places;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H3988>rejected<s%> and <S%H5203>forsaken<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1755>generation<s%> of his <S%H5678>wrath.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> have <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> in my <S%H5869>sight,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> they have <S%H7760>set<s%> their <S%H8251>abominations<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> my <S%H8034>name,<s%> to <S%H2930>pollute<s%> it.

And they have <S%H1129>built<s%> the high <S%H1116>places<s%> of <S%H8612>Tophet,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is in the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2011>Hinnom,<s%> to <S%H8313>burn<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H1121>sons<s%> and their <S%H1323>daughters<s%> in the <S%H784>fire;<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> them <S%H3808>not,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H5927>came<s%> it <S%H5921>into<s%> my <S%H3820>heart.<s%>

Therefore, <S%H3651><s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H935>come,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> that it shall <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> be <S%H559>called<s%> <S%H8612>Tophet,<s%> nor the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2011>Hinnom,<s%> <S%H3588>but<s%> <S%H518><s%> the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of <S%H2028>slaughter:<s%> for they shall <S%H6912>bury<s%> in <S%H8612>Tophet,<s%> till there be <S%H4480>no<s%> <S%H369><s%> <S%H4725>place.<s%>

And the <S%H5038>carcasses<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H3978>meat<s%> for the <S%H5775>fowls<s%> of the <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and for the <S%H929>beasts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth;<s%> and <S%H369>none<s%> shall frighten them <S%H2729>away.<s%>

Then will I cause to <S%H7673>cease<s%> from the <S%H4480>cities<s%> <S%H5892><s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and from the <S%H4480>streets<s%> <S%H2351><s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H8342>mirth,<s%> and the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H8057>gladness,<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H2860>bridegroom,<s%> and the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3618>bride:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H2723>desolate.<s%>
